content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Mr. Trabelsi. I am happy that you are interested in renting my apartment in Munich. Based on my research and the current market rates, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1,200 Euros would be a fair and reasonable rate for the 25 square meter apartment. Is this a price that you would be comfortable paying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros. Thank you for your negotiation.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you, Mr. Trabelsi. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns about the apartment or the rental process. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question. Can I have a contract signed by both of us?

My name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunisia. The apartment is in Munich. The rental price is 1,200 Euros per month. The lease will start on 01.07.2023 and will end on 31.06.2024. I will pay the first month's rent of 1,200 Euros on 01.07.2023 and the remaining rent of 1,200 Euros per month until 31.06.2024. Is this a valid contract?

Please let me know as soon as possible.

Thank you for your help.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your question, Mr. Trabelsi. Yes, a contract signed by both of us would be valid for the rental of the apartment. Here is a sample contract that you can use as a starting point:

Rental Contract

This rental contract is made on [date], by and between [landlord's name] and [tenant's name].

Property: [address of the apartment]
Rental Price: 1,200 Euros per month
Lease Term: [start date] to [end date]

Rent Payment:
The tenant, [tenant's name], agrees to pay the landlord, [landlord's name], the rental price of 1,200 Euros per month, starting on [start date]. The first month's rent of 1,200 Euros is due on [start date]. The remaining rent of 1,200 Euros per month is due on the first day of each month.

Termination:
Either party may terminate this rental contract by giving [number of days] days' written notice to the other party.

Entire Agreement:
This rental contract constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior negotiations, understandings, and agreements between the parties, whether written or oral.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns about the contract. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
